name: Nice Shot! The Gun Golfing Game
description: Golf meets FPS in this unique twist on the beloved golf genre. Use a variety of guns and your skills & finesse to rack up bonus points and come in under par! But beware-- this is one golf game that won't hold your hand! Unlock courses and a secret gun in single player, or play against your friends in multiplayer!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or newer Processor: 2.5 GHz Dual core Memory: 4 MB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 930MX or comparable DirectX: Version 10 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 6 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or newer Processor: 2.5+ GHz Quad core Memory: 8 MB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 660ti or better DirectX: Version 10 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 6 GB available space
